message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that we'll both lose money if this drags on.
I think we can both do better than your offer. I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I need a larger portion to make it worth my while.
Bob, your offer isn't taking the inflation into account seriously enough.  This is a better deal for both of us in the long run. Let's close this deal.
